ygData.subject: Re: Clash
ygData.msgSnippet: Gemini Dragon growls and hisses as the punch is countered with its tail which clamps down on the arm and gun which was headed towards one of its heads. A

Subject: Re: Clash

Content-Length: 10973
X-Mailer: eGroups Message Poster
From: Legendarynemasis@...

Gemini Dragon growls and hisses as the punch is countered with its 
tail which clamps down on the arm and gun which was headed towards 
one of its heads. A second later The Liquid Nitrogen spouting head 
unleashes a freeze beam at the second arm as Gemin dragons flaps its 
wings and begins to lift off into the air threatening to take 
Radistor with him.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: Yeah, I know, but Train Wreck has an anti-electricity system. 
I gave him that because he carries passengers.
> 
> BIC: Train Wreck is knocked over by the tail.
> 
> Train Wreck: Alright.
> 
> Stronghold and Blender both stepped out of Train Wreck and dropped 
to the ground from his now several feet off of the ground door.
> 
> Stronghold: It's too small in there.
> 
> They both transform into feet. Train Wreck changes into the body. 
Stranato and Airbomber change into the arms, and they all connect 
together. Doom ice and Rizopas both transform into huge guns and 
attach to the arms. Radistor was formed once again.
> 
> Radistor: We don't want to screw up time, we're Maximals!
> 
> Radistor swung a huge punch at Gemini Dragon's face. (Radistor is 
and always has been 50 feet tall)
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: Legendarynemasis@a... 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Saturday, July 14, 2001 10:30 PM
>   Subject: Re: Clash
> 
> 
>   Gemini Dragon: "Bring it on."
> 
>   Gemini Dragon laughed evily as it spun around sending its tail at 
>   Trainwreck.(Btw omega, Electricity does hurt robots, just letting 
you 
>   know...))
> 
>   --- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
>   > Train Wreck transforms and flips backwards to avoid it.
>   > 
>   > Train Wreck: You know, us Radicons also have a gestalt form. 
And 
>   there are 7 of us. You don't want to see it, believe me...

before

to

>   >

die..."

but 
>   the

shoulder

>   >   spins

destined to

the

>   >   >   of 
>   >   >   >   >   Methos's energy scythe each bot pushing into 
their 
>   >   weapons to 
>   >   >   >   through
